snippet: To the Editor:    Your June 14 front-page article on Ron K. Unz, the California millionaire who ''beat bilingual teaching,'' misses what was truly disturbing about his victory. As you say, he may represent a new kind of force on the California pol...
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Your June 14 front-page article on Ron K. Unz, the California millionaire who ''beat bilingual teaching,'' misses what was truly disturbing about his victory. As you say, he may represent a new kind of force on the California political scene who can change policy through narrowly focused initiatives, but he does not speak for, represent or lead a roused conservative population. No, Mr. Unz succeeds through apathy.
abstract: Tony Mastrogiorgio letter on June 14 article holds Ron K Unz succeeded in drive against bilingual education in California through voter apathy
